# BayesianDisaggregation

The `BayesianDisaggregation` package provides methods for Bayesian economic data disaggregation.

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("your_username/BayesianDisaggregation")
